Als prophezeite Dunkelheit von ihrer Familie verstoßen, ist alles, was Ashtarte sich wünscht, geliebt zu werden. Magie zu erlernen scheint die einzige Möglichkeit zu sein, dies zu erreichen. Eines Tages stolpert sie über einen Zauberspruch des Schicksals, der sie an einen unbekannten Ort teleportiert. Dort erwartet sie ein Junge namens Abelion Elforman, dessen Hände in Ketten liegen und den seine düstere Vergangenheit zu fesseln scheint. Können die beiden zusammenarbeiten, um Licht in ihre dunkle Vergangenheit zu bringen?\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6857273)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8671461), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=798277)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/ashtarte)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/heianhuangnvyashitailuodi/list?title_no=2268)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/book/ashtarte-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/book/ashtarte-de)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0002674)","en":"“The Firenze Empire will be met with a new light and darkness, but the darkness will swallow the light and bring the empire to ruin.” \n\nIn an imperial family praised for their silver locks, Princess Ashtarte’s unique black hair is immediately stigmatized as a bad omen. With her family shunning her for being the prophesied darkness, all Ashtarte wants is to be loved, and learning magic is her sole option to achieving that. One day, she stumbles upon a spell of destiny that teleports her to an unknown place. Waiting for her there is a boy in shackles named Abelion Elforman, who is anchored by a grim past of his own. Will these two be able to work together to bring light to their dark fates?\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6857273)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Naver خاطر موهای نقره‌ای‌شان ستایش میشوند، موهای سیاه منحصربه‌فرد پرنسس اشتارته بلافاصله به عنوان یک بدشانسی دیده میشود. با خانواده ای که ازش به خاطر تاریکی پیشگویی شده دوری میکنند، تنها چیزی که اشتارته Then Sonya, a clumsy and chipper Russian maid carrying a strange talisman, enters his life. In short, Gisuke's hapless life has turned into a struggle for power."},"links":{"al":"33883","bw":"series/79660/list","mu":"3xg6gws"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

e7babb89-96ba-40b1-b380-53f7e6ef4acf:::||@!@||:::{"id":"e7babb89-96ba-40b1-b380-53f7e6ef4acf","title":{"en":"Yubisaki wa Koi no Aji"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Fingertips’ Love"},{"de":"Schlimme Finger"},{"zh":"手指尖的恋滋味"},{"ja":"指先は恋の味"}],"lastChapter":"5.6","availableTranslatedLanguages":["pl","en"],"description":{"en":"1-5) Fingertips' Love  \nHajime and Eiji, who were childhood friends, have been reunited at an all-boy's high school (oh, the possibilities). Gdy Hajime powraca do Japonii, by wspólnie z Eijim uczęszczać do męskiego liceum, a nawet dzielić z nim pokój w internacie, przyszłość jawi mu się w jasnych barwach. Jednak sytuacja znacznie komplikuje się w momencie, gdy Eiji wyznaje mu swoje uczucia. A wygląda na to, że Hajime wzbudził również zainteresowanie przystojnego wielbiciela kwiatków Jingujiego, co z kolei nie podoba się pewnemu kapitanowi drużyny siatkarzy. Czy Hajime odnajdzie w głębi serca odpowiedź na pytanie: czy to jest przyjaźń, czy to jest kochanie? I czy drobne intrygi wujka Kaia zdołają doprowadzić młodzieńców do szczęśliwego finału?"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4862633420/","ap":"yubisaki-wa-koi-no-aji","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-51346","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/399501/","mu":"10792","raw":"https://www.cmoa.jp/title/36122/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}}]}

Czy między nim i Kurosawą nawiąże się nić porozumienia?"},"links":{"al":"35026","ap":"doushiyoumo-nai-keredo","kt":"10599","mal":"5026","mu":"13764"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

e89751ae-d400-416b-8525-58f65e0f1d60:::||@!@||:::{"id":"e89751ae-d400-416b-8525-58f65e0f1d60","title":{"en":"Guardians of the Light"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"燈の守り人"},{"ja-ro":"Akari No Moribito"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Light Calendar year 2045. A world where the coastline has been greatly submerged under the sea. A young man named Yukari Fujikura is attacked by the sea monster known as “Suika” on his quest to find his missing grandfather. e8a562c7-0632-4d9c-8262-3e9e8378ed83:::||@!@||:::{"id":"e8a562c7-0632-4d9c-8262-3e9e8378ed83","title":{"en":"Touch the Pes"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"ペスよおをふれ"}],"description":{"en":"This is a full-length girls' manga that was serialized in the magazine Nakayoshi from 1957 to 1959 and received enthusiastic support from readers at the time. This is the story of Yuri, a girl with a strong bond, and her pet dog Pes, who wander across the country despite being repeatedly separated.The themes of love and friendship between parents and children are depicted with lyricism. It depicts the townscape and people of the 1950s,\nand is a valuable work as a record of the scenery and customs of the time. It was also broadcast nationwide as a radio program starring Tomoko Matsushita, and is known for starting the Spitz boom. This work is also valuable as the root of the pet manga that later became a genre of manga. This time, we will be reprinting three of the eight books in one volume. Includes commentary by Taro Minamoto and Tomoko Matsushima at the end of the book."},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}}]}

Thousands of years ago, GoLion was an arrogant robot who, after defeating several Beastmen, tried to challenge the goddess of the universe into battle, but failed. For GoLion's hubris, the goddess taught him humility by separating him into five pieces in the form of five lion robots that sailed through space and crash-landed on Altea, to lay in wait for those who would one day reawaken him to fight evil once again.[1][2][3] The Princess of Altea, Fala, recruits the five of them so they can become the new pilots of GoLion and help her start fighting back against the Empire."},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"e64f6742-c834-471d-8d72-dd51fc02b835","name":{"en":"Aliens"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

One day after a car accident, she finds herself inside that novel! It's amazing but surreal to meet her beloved side character Cail in person, so much that her shoulders dance in excitement.\n\nUsing her sincerity and good physique, she sets on giving Cail the happiness he deserves... But for some reason, Cail can hear her malicious thoughts about him! What a useless telepathy!\n\nThinking of Cail makes Geumja's heart racing for a day. If she could be by his side, she can do anything! Even crossdress!\n\nAnother day to get through with Kim Geumja and her absurd thoughts about her favorite character!\n\n---\nGeumja Kim is the biggest (and only) fan of Kyle du Vilteon, a side character in the fantasy novel King Maker. Her never-ending search for Kyle content is forever changed when she dies while rereading the book… and somehow awakens in Kyle’s bedroom to a new life within the novel’s pages! She is then shocked to learn that Kyle can also hear her thoughts—luckily, only if she thinks of his name. Still, there’s no time for this fangirl to daydream because Kyle is doomed to die. e959ee87-cae7-4903-82b3-fa8800bb8ce6:::||@!@||:::{"id":"e959ee87-cae7-4903-82b3-fa8800bb8ce6","title":{"en":"The Lady and the Beast"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"그녀와 야수"},{"ko-ro":"Geunyowa Yasu"},{"en":"She and the Beast"},{"en":"The Woman and the Beast"},{"en":"The Girl and the Beast"},{"de":"Die Schöne und das Biest"},{"fr":"La belle et la bête"},{"es":"Ella y la bestia"},{"uk":"Вона та звір"},{"ru":"Она и зверь"},{"th":"เลดี้กับท่านชายอสูร"},{"ja":"彼女と野獣"},{"tr":"Kız ve Canavar"},{"zh":"她与野兽"},{"zh-hk":"她與野獸"},{"vi":"Người Đẹp Và Quái Vật"},{"mn":"Авхай ба араатан"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["pl","ru","pt-br","en","id","es-la","fr"],"relatedIdds":["30a25cec-e515-4050-a7be-2a71f22600fc"],"description":{"de":"Nach einem Leben voller Blutvergießen und Kummer wird die große Kaiserin Martina wiedergeboren als Astina, geniale Tochter eines bescheidenen Grafen. Aber ihre friedliche Welt zerbricht, als der Bankrott der Familie ihren Vater dazu zwingt, sie an den gefährlichen Erzherzog Atalenta zu verheiraten. Dieser ist in der feinen Gesellschaft bekannt als „Terriod die Bestie“, weil er durch einen Familienfluch in ein wildes Monster verwandelt wurde. Glücklicherweise ist selbst die tödliche Bestie von Atalenta dem mächtigen Schwert der ehemaligen Kaiserin nicht gewachsen. Alle sind geschockt, als die neue Erzherzogin ihren Ehemann kurzerhand zähmt und zum Familienoberhaupt wird. Niemand ist jedoch mehr überrascht als Astina selbst, als ein einfacher Kuss Terriod zurück in einen Menschen verwandelt. Er ähnelt nicht nur ihrem Liebhaber aus ihrem vergangenen Leben, sondern hat auch noch keinerlei Erinnerungen an sie von seiner Zeit als Bestie. Kann sich dieses mächtige Paar trotz der unangenehmen Umstände zusammentun und über das Erzherzogtum herrschen?\n\n---\n[Official English Novel Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-lady-and-the-beast-novel)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B7%B8%EB%85%80%EC%99%80-%EC%95%BC%EC%88%98/2760), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55566760)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-lady-and-the-beast)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/the-lady-and-the-beast-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-lady-and-the-beast-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Lady-and-the-Beast/24)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/67330)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%A3/210)","en":"100 years after her death, Empress Martina, the founder of the Carabella Empire, reincarnates as Astina Lette, the daughter of a count. Her peaceful, everyday life as a noble lady, a stark contrast to her past life, is short-lived, however.\n\nWith the bankruptcy of her father's failed trade business, her family falls into great debt. Astina decides to sell herself off to marry Grand Duke Thereode in place of her sister Kanna to save her family from their financial crisis. But Thereode is forever cursed to take on the form of a beast, and no one expects her to survive the night with him…\n\nStill, defying all odds, she fights the beast with her impressive swordsmanship, and miraculously survives. Over time, a slow relationship begins to kindle between them as she tames him as her pet.\n\n---\nFollowing a life of bloodshed and heartbreak, the great Empress Martina is reborn as Astina, the genius daughter of a humble count. But her peaceful world is shattered when bankruptcy forces her father to marry her off to the dangerous Archduke Atalenta. All of high society knows him as \"Theriod the Beast\" because of a family curse that turned him into a wild monster. Luckily, even the deadly beast of Atalenta is no match for the former empress's mighty sword. \n\nEveryone is shocked when the new archduchess tames her husband all too easily and takes over as the family head. No one's more surprised than Astina, however, when her casual kiss returns Theriod to his human form. Not only does he resemble her past life lover, but he has no memory of her from his wolf days. Despite these awkward circumstances, can the new power couple join hands to rule over the archduchy?\n\n---\n[Official English Novel Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-lady-and-the-beast-novel)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B7%B8%EB%85%80%EC%99%80-%EC%95%BC%EC%88%98/2760), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55566760)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-lady-and-the-beast)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/the-lady-and-the-beast-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-lady-and-the-beast-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Lady-and-the-Beast/24)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/67330)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%A3/210)","fr":"Après une vie ponctuée de massacres et de trahisons, l'impératrice Martina se réincarne dans le corps d'Astina, de longues années plus tard. Seulement, cette fois aussi, sa vie ne sera pas de tout repos, puisqu'après que leur père a fait faillite, la sœur d'Astina est mariée de force à l'archiduc Atalenta, un homme victime d'une terrible malédiction le transformant en monstre. Astina décide alors de prendre la place de la jeune Kanna, et affronte sans mal la bête terrifiante qu'est devenu l'archiduc. Elle n'en reste pas moins surprise d'arriver à gérer la situation avec tant de facilité, et l'est encore plus lorsqu'un simple baiser de sa part finit par rendre son apparence à l'archiduc, qui en plus de ressembler étrangement à l'homme donc Martina était amoureuse, n'a plus aucun souvenir d'elle lorsqu'il était un loup. Malgré cette situation on ne peut plus étrange, vont-ils réussir à maintenir l'ordre dans le duché et à régner main dans la main?\n\n---\n[Official English Novel сотню лет после смерти Мартины — основательницы империи, легенда переродилась в теле Астины — одной из дочерей аристократической семьи. Ее мирная повседневная жизнь, так отличавшаяся от предыдущей, оборвалась в тот миг, когда обанкротившийся отец продал ее звероподобному эрцгерцогу Териоту. Но вопреки многочисленным ожиданиям, что девушка, встретившись с чудовищем, в одночасье погибнет, благодаря своему исключительному мастерству владения мечом Астина победила монстра и приручила его, словно домашнего питомца…\n\n---\n[Official English Novel Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-lady-and-the-beast-novel)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B7%B8%EB%85%80%EC%99%80-%EC%95%BC%EC%88%98/2760), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55566760)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-lady-and-the-beast)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/the-lady-and-the-beast-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-lady-and-the-beast-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Lady-and-the-Beast/24)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/67330)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%A3/210)","uk":"Через 100 років після смерті, імператриця Мартіна, засновниця імперії Карабелла, перевтілюється в Астіну Летте, дочку графа. Однак її мирне повсякденне життя благородної дами, що різко контрастує з її минулим життям, є недовгим.\n\nПісля банкрутства невдалого торгового бізнесу її батька, її родина потрапляє у великі борги. Астіна вирішує продати себе, щоб вийти заміж за великого герцога Тереоду, замість своєї сестри Канни, щоб врятувати свою сім'ю від фінансової кризи. Але Тереода назавжди проклятий мати образ звіра, і ніхто не очікує, що вона переживе ніч з ним...\n\n---\n[Official English Novel e9ce017c-d2bb-4de0-8813-60c626fa93ba:::||@!@||:::{"id":"e9ce017c-d2bb-4de0-8813-60c626fa93ba","title":{"en":"Mirai no Kioku"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Future Lovers"},{"en":"未来の記憶"}],"lastChapter":"4","availableTranslatedLanguages":["it","pl","tr"],"relatedIdds":["52c6fc9b-abb8-428b-9d02-4556c5a33ab4"],"description":{"en":"A romantic lover awaits you… in the future. Kento Kumagaya wishes for the simple things in life: to have a happy family with the ideal housewife, loving kids, and kind grandparents all living together, happily ever after. Fate, however, has other plans. Enter Akira Kazuki, a smart, beautiful and unrestrained gay man who shatters Kento's dream with a single night of wild and passionate homosexual sex. Mas só quando ele acha que as estrelas estão alinhadas em seu favor, ele involuntariamente arruma encrenca com menina mais temida na escola, Aisaka Taiga, fazendo-a seu arqui-inimigo. Mas confusões acabam juntando os dois já que Taiga mora ao lado do Ryuuji com interesses parecidos os dois se juntam para tentar conquistar seus objetivos!
